Used to be good but honestly getting out of silver is a pain if not impossible.

Ever sense the game went Free-to-play it has been infested with cheater/ hackers and smurfs(I know this has always been a problem but its worse now than it ever has been). To make this worse there isn't any options to change servers from what i know so if your in Europe your most likely going to get stuck with people that don't speak a tad of English, making team communication impossible unless you have a pre-made team.

My main issue is how bad the anti-cheat is and how many hackers there are now-a-days and I really wish this wasn't a problem. 

Also should mention that there is a huge shift of focus to the new tier system instead of the more important things like the game's security etc which honestly make its feel like a bigger cash cow than CS ever has which really sucks the fun out of it.
